intro: Stop the hordes of enemies and defend your castle!
description:
Being a hero isn't easy. Use all your skills to protect people from the hordes. Stay alert to keep everyone safe.  

Use all available weapons to cause as much damage as possible. Find the explosives on the levels and blow up your enemies.

Clear the all levels from the danger and keep your fortress safe. Shoot. Reload. And shoot again. Repeat.   

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Clear your world from the enemies and keep everyone safe!
